CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains warm-up then leaves the room
MOT puts her purse on the floor
CHI watches MOT then looks at door as INV leaves
MOT sits cross-legged on the floor in front of CHI . MOT looks at CHI
CHI looks at MOT then stands up while holding a toy out towards MOT
CHI walks towards MOT while holding out the duck
MOT accepts duck from CHI then holds it in the air between them
CHI watches MOT then looks down at football
CHI holds the football up in the air then takes a step back from MOT
MOT reaches out toward football but does not touch it
CHI turns to the side then reaches out for duck
CHI looks from one toy to the other as she holds them
CHI squats on floor with toys in her hand . CHI puts football on floor and lets go of it
<bef> CHI picks up object from floor
<aft> CHI stands up then turns toward the jack+in+the+box
CHI reaches down for the jack+in+the+box
MOT reaches down for the jack+in+the+box
<3 .> MOT turns jack+in+the+box right side up
CHI stares at the jack+in+the+box then looks at the duck in her hand
<bef> MOT taps the top of the jack+in+the+box with her index finger
CHI taps the top of the jack+in+the+box with her index finger
CHI looks back over her shoulder then stands up and turns around in front of MOT
CHI bends down while reaching for the football then CHI reaches instead for the tape on the floor
CHI alters her gesture when she sees the tape on the floor in front of her
CHI grabs at the tape with her fingers
CHI grabs another part of the tape
CHI reaches for the football while remaining in a squat position
CHI picks up the football with one hand
CHI looks around the room while holding the football in one hand and the duck in the other
MOT reaches over and touches CHIs hair
CHI stands up and looks at both objects she holds in her hands
<aft> CHI throws football on the ground
MOT watches as ball rolls away
CHI walks across the room then looks up towards camera
CHI stops walking and looks up in response to a noise
MOT looks at the camera then at CHI
CHI continues to look around room
CHI bends down and picks up football then turns around . CHI walks around looking down while holding toys in her hands
CHI looks around as she turns towards MOT . <aft> CHI holds out a toy towards MOT
CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box as she bounces up and down while holding the football below her chin
CHI looks down then over her shoulder and around the room
CHI walks in a small circle twice in front of MOT while looking down at the floor
MOT watches CHI . MOT smiles at CHI
CHI stops turning around in a circle then looks at MOT
<aft> CHI bends down and places duck in the rear of the truck
CHI pushes truck with duck still in her hand
<aft> CHI moves duck away from the truck
CHI puts football down then tilts the football up
CHI stares at the football then looks at the duck in her other hand
CHI turns the duck around in her hand then puts it to her mouth
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box down on the floor . MOT turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI watches MOT then reaches for the football
CHI picks up football then stands up
<bef> MOT moves her upper body as the jack+in+the+box pops up
MOT turns the jack+in+the+box around to face CHI
MOT pushes the clown down again
CHI is still holding onto the duck although it is not visible on camera
CHI reaches forward and grabs the cover of the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes forward on the cover
not a directive because MOT does it
MOT holds the cover with one hand while pushing down on the clown with the other
CHI touches the clown and the cover
MOT holds clown down with one hand
CHI opens cover and touches clown
CHI touches top of clowns head as MOT holds him down
MOT nudges the cover down with her index finger then lifts it up . MOT withdraws her hands
CHI grabs the cover and attempts to push down the cover . CHI hits the cover once with her hand and then the clown pops up
<$=1> MOT pushes the clown back into the box
CHI puts her hand on the cover and tries to push down
<aft> MOT touches the handle and pushes the cover into place
MOT holds box still for CHI
<bef> CHI touches the top of the box then removes her hands from the box
<aft> MOT removes her hands from the box
CHI squeezes duck with two hands
CHI reaches for the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI lifts up the jack+in+the+box by the handle . CHI drops jack+in+the+box on the floor in front of MOT
MOT turns the jack+in+the+box right side up . MOT rests the jack+in+the+box on her leg
MOT turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT is turning the handle backwards so the music is also played backwards
CHI watches MOT then looks away before MOT is finished
<aft> CHI turns around and touches football
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box on the floor
CHI reaches for the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns the jack+in+the+box by the handle then removes her hands
CHI hits on the cover with the palm of her hand and the clown pops up
CHI stares at the clown with her arm extended toward jack+in+the+box
MOT holds clowns head back with two fingers
CHI attempts to push clown down into box with her index finger
clown pops up and CHI releases hand
MOT touches the clowns head with her index finger
CHI attempts to push clown down
MOT pushes clown into box with her index finger
CHIs hand follows MOTs movement with the clown
MOT points to the cover while still holding clown down
CHI touches top of clowns head then CHI grabs cover and pulls it down
<$=1> MOT snaps the cover into place with index finger and turns the handle once
MOT refers to securing the handle
<aft> MOT puts her hands in her lap
MOT turns the jack+in+the+box slightly toward CHI
CHI touches the top of the jack+in+the+box
CHI picks up jack+in+the+box by the handle and shakes the box around
CHI looks at the area in front of her
CHI looks at the duck in her hand
CHI turns her back on MOT then looks around . <aft> CHI reaches for the football
CHI bumps the football then it rolls out of her reach
CHI leans back then looks around
CHI touches the football then looks at surrounding toys
CHI turns then reaches for the jack+in+the+box
CHI touches the top of the jack+in+the+box with her index finger
rising intonation in the middle of the syllable
<aft> CHI lifts jack+in+the+box up by the handle
<aft> CHI puts the box back on the floor
INV enters and explains Small Scale Activity then leaves room at 12:57:12 and reenters at 13:02:05
INV explains forbidden object then places it on the table in front of CHI
CHI is holding a round typewriter eraser from the small scale activity
INV sets object on table then starts object in motion
<bef> INV sets the object in motion
CHI reaches up to touch object
MOT reaches over with her index finger
CHI raises her arm toward object
< .1-3> MOT reaches toward CHIs hand with her index finger but does not touch the CHI
CHI continues to stare at the object then looks at MOT
<aft> CHI looks over her shoulder toward the door
CHI turns around then glances at the eraser in her hand then up at the object
CHI looks in the direction of the Investigator
INV explains PCI boxes to MOT then leaves the room
CHI watches INV leave the room
<bef> CHI looks behind her then watches MOT
MOT lifts and sets boxes down on the desk
CHI walks over to table and bangs her hands on it
<bef> MOT takes ball from the box and sets it on the table
MOT picks up CHI and places her in play area
CHI walks towards ball on the floor then bends down and picks up ball
MOT stands in front of CHI
CHI turns towards MOT then looks at MOT
MOT bends and puts her hands on her knees
CHI throws ball near MOTs feet
MOT squats down to retrieve ball
CHI bends down and reaches for the ball
CHI stands up . CHI looks at MOT
MOT looks at ball then watches CHI
CHI watches the ball pass by then turns and picks up ball
CHI makes a quarter turn and lifts ball above her head
CHI takes two steps . CHI throws ball on the floor
MOT grabs ball as it rolls near her . MOT rolls ball back to CHI
CHI bends as ball rolls past her . CHI turns and walks over to ball
CHI picks up ball and raises it above her head
CHI turns towards then looks at MOT
CHI takes one step and throws ball
CHI looks at MOT then at ball
MOT grabs ball then sits on floor with legs spread apart
CHI watches ball as it bounces off of her knee
MOT taps ball closer to CHI
CHI bends down and grabs ball . CHI stands up with ball raised above her head . CHI throws ball to MOT
CHI looks at ball then at MOT
CHI bends down and grabs ball . CHI stands up and bounces ball to MOT
CHI looks at MOT then CHI looks at ball
CHI bends down to pick up ball after ball has touched her knee then lifts ball up to shoulder level and then drops ball in front of MOT
MOT reaches for the ball then looks at CHI
CHI walks towards MOT with open arms
CHI tries to pull ball from MOTs hands
CHI turns and walks away from MOT
CHI walks toward the table and then drops the ball
CHI follows ball as it rolls away . CHI briefly squats down on all fours then stands up . CHI raises her arms and slaps them against her thigh
CHI looks down then reaches down and picks up the ball . CHI looks at the ball while in a squat position
CHI looks around room while still holding ball
CHI looks at MOT then stands up and turns in the direction of MOT
<$=1> MOT reaches down and picks up ball
CHI watches as the ball rolls past her
CHI turns and walks over to the ball
CHI bends down and picks up ball
CHI turns a quarter turn and throws ball on the floor
MOT reaches out and pulls ball closer to her . <aft> MOT looks at the ball then at CHI
CHI steps toward ball as it is bouncing toward her
CHI looks at ball as it bounces off of her knee
CHI bends down briefly then stands up
MOT retrieves ball as ball rolls back to her
MOT rolls the ball toward CHI
CHI looks at MOT then at ball
CHI turns and squats in front of the ball
CHI touches ball which makes it roll slightly away
CHI takes a step while still squatting down and puts one hand on the ball
CHI balances herself with one hand on the floor
CHI loses balance and falls on the floor keeping one hand on the ball
CHI sits up on her knees and withdraws hand from ball
CHI looks at the trash can
CHI grabs plastic bag on trash can and tries to pull herself up . CHI grabs the top of the trash can
<$=2> MOT takes CHIs arm off of the trash can
CHI looks at ball which is at her side
MOT is directing CHI to go after ball
MOT releases CHIs arm and rolls the ball
MOT rolls the ball towards the center of the floor
<aft> MOT points to the ball then looks at CHI
CHI watches ball roll across floor
CHI turns around and stands up
CHI points and looks at something across the room
MOT points to and looks at the ball
CHI looks at something underneath table
MOT stands up and picks up ball . MOT puts the ball on the desk
MOT whistles as if to beckon CHI
MOT shakes blanket up and down
MOT crawls to CHI who is under the table
MOT takes a plastic container from under the table and places it on the desk
MOT pulls CHI out from under the table
MOT sets CHI on her feet
<bef> MOT puts the blanket over MOTs head
CHI walks toward MOT with arms outstretched
CHI pulls blanket off of MOTs head
CHI turns away from MOT then drops the towel to the floor . CHI bends down onto her knees
<9-10> MOT tosses blanket on CHIs back
CHI sits up with blanket over her head
CHI pulls the blanket off of her head
CHI looks under the desk and points to something
MOT reaches through the chair legs and grabs object
MOT puts object on the desk
MOT picks up blanket and puts it on her head
CHI sits in front of MOT looking in MOTs direction
CHI raises and lowers her arms quickly
CHI turns toward desk then looks underneath it
CHI crawls under the desk away from MOT
MOT yanks the blanket off of her head
<aft> MOT crawls over to the desk
CHI crawls further under the desk
MOT moves over to where CHI is then reaches out and taps CHI on the bottom
CHI looks at MOT from under the desk
MOT reaches around and grabs the blanket behind her
MOT is kneeling beside the desk
CHI pulls round object out from under the desk
MOT folds the blanket . MOT puts the blanket in the box
CHI begins to crawl out from under the desk
MOT takes object from CHI and puts it on the desk
CHI moves out from underneath the desk and chair
CHI looks across the room at something as she tries to stand up
CHI steadies herself near the desk and focuses on an object across the room . CHI rests on her hands and knees
<bef> MOT takes a piece of paper and crayons from the box on the desk
MOT crawls to the middle of the room and sets the paper down on the seat of a chair and then holds up a crayon
CHI watches MOT then stands up and walks over to MOT
CHI takes a crayon from MOTs hand
CHI takes the other crayon from MOTs hand
CHI looks first at one crayon and then at the other
MOT looks at paper then at CHI
MOT taps her finger on the paper
CHI walks over to the chair with the paper on it
MOT taps index finger on paper several times
CHI taps crayon on the paper . CHI moves crayon on paper with right hand
MOT holds the paper steady with one hand
CHI makes circles on the paper
CHI looks at crayon in left hand
CHI looks at paper then at the crayon
CHI puts both crayons horizontally on the paper
CHI leans over and looks closer at paper
CHI moves the crayons in small tight movements
<aft> CHI looks to the right toward the table
CHI taps the crayon on the paper
MOT stands up and walks to the desk
MOT is only visible from the waist down
MOT puts her crayon on the paper while holding the paper steady with her other hand
MOT draws a horizontal line across the paper
CHI lifts her hands off of the paper
CHI taps the paper with the crayon . CHI makes small circles with the crayon
<aft> CHI leans closer to paper looking at both crayons in her hands
MOT makes several small marks on the paper
CHI looks around room while still leaning on the chair
CHI continues to look around her . CHI looks at the crayons
CHI looks closely at the crayon in her hand
CHI leans over chair and puts her face close to the paper
MOT puts a small crayon on the chair
MOT takes the crayon off the chair
CHI turns and reaches for crayon in MOTs hand
MOT opens her hand with the crayons in it
CHI looks at the crayon then reaches for the crayon
MOT quickly closes her hand into a fist and turns it palm facing down
MOT turns her hand over and opens her fist showing CHI the crayon . MOT closes her hand
MOT quickly opens and closes her fist
CHIs back is facing the camera
MOT puts the crayon in her other hand and makes a fist
CHI looks at then touches MOT fist
CHI takes crayon from MOTs hand
CHI turns and walks in a circle back to the chair
CHI puts her fists on the paper while clutching the crayons
CHI bends over the chair putting her face close to the paper . CHI looks back over her shoulder
CHI looks around room while still leaning on the chair
CHI looks at crayons in her hand . CHI looks at MOT then at MOT's hands . CHI looks at her hands
CHI leans over the chair and makes marks with the small crayon . CHI creases the paper
CHI takes a large crayon from her left hand and holds it with her right . CHI makes a mark with her left hand and leaves her hand on the paper . CHI crouches over the chair
CHI looks at crayons in both hands
CHI straightens up and looks at the crayons in her hand
CHI changes crayons from hand to hand
CHI turns around and walks to the table with crayons in her hands
CHI taps the crayon on the table top

CHI walks to the chair and makes marks on the paper
CHI bends over the chair and puts arms on the paper which creases the paper
CHI looks at the crayons in her hand
CHI releases grasp on one crayon and continues to pick it up and release it
<bef> CHI stands up and picks up the crayons
CHI turns and walks in a large circle around the room
MOT takes paper off of the chair as she stands up
CHI points to and looks at the wall above the chair with crayons still in her hand
MOT may refer to CHI looking at reflection in mirror across the room . MOT is only visible from the waist down
CHI continues to look at the wall
CHI points to and looks at another spot on the wall
CHI points to and looks at the wall behind the trash can
<bef> CHI lowers her arm . CHI looks at the crayons in her hand

CHI walks to the table and places her hand on top of it

MOT walks closer to CHI then stands behind CHI leaning over her
CHI continues to look off to one side

CHI moves her arms away with crayons still in hand
MOT leans over and looks at CHI
CHI holds crayons close to her body
CHI bangs her fist on the table . CHI puts both fists on the table

CHI walks to the chair and puts her fists down on the seat . CHI releases the small crayon from her fist . CHI puts the small crayon in her mouth
